articles.author: JIM GOMEZ
articles.title: Latest typhoon lashes the Philippines, causing tidal surges and displacing massive numbers of people - The Associated Press
articles.description: A powerful typhoon has wrecked houses, caused towering tidal surges and forced hundreds of thousands of people to flee to emergency shelters as it barreled across the northern Philippines in the sixth major storm to pound the Southeast Asian country in less t…
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines (AP) A powerful typhoon wrecked houses, caused towering tidal surges and forced hundreds of thousands of people to flee to emergency shelters as it cut across the northern Philipp… [+3417 chars]
